question: Which is the branch site consensus sequence in U12-dependent introns?
ideal_answer: The branch site consensus sequence in U12-dependent introns is UUCCUUAAC.

snippets.text: Highly conserved sequences at the 5' splice site and branch site of U12-dependent introns are important determinants for splicing by U12-dependent spliceosomes. This study investigates the in vivo splicing phenotypes of mutations in the branch site consensus sequence of the U12-dependent intron F from a human NOL1 (P120) minigene. Intron F contains a fully consensus branch site sequence (UUCCUUAAC).
Intron F contains a fully consensus branch site sequence (UUCCUUAAC).
